course_description: The course involves the application of physical chemical approaches to study biological macromolecules. Topics will include the study of biomacromolecular structure, stability, and mechanism. Physical/analytical methods will be applied to understand the structure and function of biological macromolecules.
schedule_location: TTh 1pm-2:15pm in Emerson Chemistry Bldg. E363
sections: Class Nbr: 1772, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: TTh 1-2:15p, Instructor: K. Davis, Status: Open
